messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] surfing for little guys
messages.msgSnippet: ... As far as I know they don t have on line games but http://www.kidsdomain.com has a large but selective offering of downloadable games that can be sorted by
messages.messageBody:
on 1/28/02 11:53 PM, Annette Naake at naake1999@... wrote:

> Can anyone recommend good Web sites with games for my 4yo and 9yo? I'm
> especially looking for something for my 4yo ... he likes games, coloring,
> music, etc. but doesn't read yet. He loves all animals, extinct and extant.

As far as I know they don't have on line games but

http://www.kidsdomain.com

has a large but selective offering of downloadable games that can be sorted
by age, category, computer (real nice for us Mac people! ;-). Good stuff
free!

Joyce


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: surfing for little guys
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, Can anyone recommend good Web sites with games for my 4yo and 9yo? I m especially looking for something for my 4yo ...  he likes games, coloring, music,
messages.messageBody:
Hey,

Can anyone recommend good Web sites with games for my 4yo and 9yo? I'm
especially looking for something for my 4yo ... he likes games, coloring,
music, etc. but doesn't read yet. He loves all animals, extinct and extant.

Many thanks.
Annette
